item.title: About us
item.description:
Isabella

I started practicing Yoga with age 19 and through my regular practice I came in touch with meditation also. Different teachers and influences accompanied my path.

My first yoga studio I visited in Vienna and I can still highly recommend it.

Adelheid Ohlig who created Luna Yoga. Here I discovered the power of Yoga in the female form. I learnt a lot with Gyöngyi in Vienna.

In Ireland I completed my teacher training in 2017 and since then I teach on a regular basis. Noeleen Tyrrell offereda new energetic way with Anusara Yoga.

The gentle side of body movement I experienced with Somatic Yoga and Lisa Petersen.

In Jampa Ling, the Tibetan Buddhist center in Ireland, I have practiced meditation and studied buddhism for years. Also, I have worked as a housekeeper and yoga teacher in the center. If you like to support the center in any way, you can donate here.

Another project I treasure and volunteered for is Projekt Ruanda.

Raphael

I’ve learned Kum Nye Yoga in Dzogchen Beara, and I’ve deepened my meditation practice in Jampa Ling.
